bioconda.name: bioconductor-snpstats
bioconda.summary: SnpMatrix and XSnpMatrix classes and methods

biotools.summary: Classes and statistical methods for large SNP association studies. This extends the earlier snpMatrix package, allowing for uncertainty in genotypes.

bioschemas.name: snpStats
bioschemas.summary: Classes and statistical methods for large SNP association studies. This extends the earlier snpMatrix package, allowing for uncertainty in genotypes.
